column4: are there any other linux distributions that are as user friendly as ubuntu? it looks like getting this install to work isnt going to happen in the near future...
most user friendly in this earth sounds like the sort of thing im looking for.

ok i found myproblem on some forum somewhere and it says the solution is "sudo apt-get install xserver-xorg-video-ati" but it doesnt say anything about what im supposed to do with those two commands or where im supposed to type them.
